mapper.sql: LTBK_ID, LTBK_NAME, LTBK_DELFLAG, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), LTBK_ADDTIME, 20) ) ADDTIME, TLQ_ID
mapper.insert: insert into LTBK (LTBK_ID, LTBK_NAME, LTBK_DELFLAG, LTBK_ADDTIME, TLQ_ID) values (#{ltbkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ltbkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ltbkDelflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ltbkAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tlqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into LTBK
LTBK_ID,
LTBK_NAME,
LTBK_DELFLAG,
LTBK_ADDTIME,
TLQ_ID,
#{ltbkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ltbkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ltbkDelflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ltbkAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{tlqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update LTBK
LTBK_NAME = #{ltbkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LTBK_DELFLAG = #{ltbkDelflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LTBK_ADDTIME = #{ltbkAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TLQ_ID = #{tlqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LTBK_ID = #{ltbkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from LTBK where LTBK_DELFLAG=1
and LTBK_NAME like '%${ltbkName}%'

select LTBK_ID, LTBK_NAME, LTBK_DELFLAG, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), LTBK_ADDTIME, 20) ) ADDTIME, TLQ_ID, (select TLQ_NAME from TLQ where TLQ_ID = t2.TLQ_ID) tlqName from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from LTBK T where LTBK_DELFLAG=1
and LTBK_NAME like '%${ltbkName}%'
order by T.LTBK_ID desc ) as t1 order by LTBK_ID asc) as t2 order by LTBK_ADDTIME desc
select LTBK_ID, LTBK_NAME, LTBK_DELFLAG, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), LTBK_ADDTIME, 20) ) ADDTIME, TLQ_ID from LTBK where LTBK_DELFLAG=1 order by LTBK_ADDTIME DESC
mapper.update: update LTBK set LTBK_ADDTIME = (select CONVERT(varchar(20), getdate(), 120)) where LTBK_ID = #{ltbkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
